opened_normal: Voting opened for "$title"! You can vote by $command X
opened_tips: Voting by tipping opened for "$title"! You can vote by adding hashtag #voteX into tip message
opened_bits: Voting by cheering opened for "$title"! You can vote by adding hashtag #voteX into bit message
notEnoughOptions: $sender, new voting must have at least 2 options!
